snippet: Viewership is hard to predict: about 449,000 people tuned in to the last debate, which was broadcast on a Tuesday evening.
abstract: Trailside blog; first televised debate among Democratic candidates for New York City mayor was viewed by about 449,000 people.
lead_paragraph: Viewership is hard to predict: about 449,000 people tuned in to the last debate, which was broadcast on a Tuesday evening.

headline.main: Impressive Ratings for Last Week’s Democratic Mayoral Debate
headline.print_headline: Impressive Ratings For Last Week’s Debate
